about_the_game:
Casino Rogue is a poker inspired roguelike card game with a retro pixel art style.

To beat the House and win in this Casino, your goal is to acquire points by playing poker inspired hands to get to the highest level you can!

During play, you will leverage special Chips and Stamps that provide effects to help you acquire more and more points.

Your choices will matter as you decide what Chips and Stamps to combine and leverage.

What are you waiting for? Step into Casino Rogue and pursue the highest level you can!

Challenge your friends and see if they can beat your Casino Rogue Level!

Pretty soon everyone will be asking each other...what is your CR Level?

name: Casino Rogue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Casino Rogue is a poker inspired roguelike card game in which you play with familiar playing cards and leverage special Chips and Stamps to gain points and reach for the highest level you can. What will your Casino Rogue Level be?
